table.name: vtiger_businessrules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_businessrules` ( `businessrulesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `businessrules_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `businessrules_number` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `businessrule` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `module_rules` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `linktomap` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `busrule_roles` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_businessrulescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_businessrulescf` ( `businessrulesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`businessrulesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
